attributes.action: Reject any treaties or future treaty agreements arising from the Copenhagen climate conference until a full investigation has been carried out in to the contents of emails, data files and program data leaked or hacked from the University of East Anglia’s Climate Research Unit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Emails, data files, program data etc. have been leaked or hacked from the University of East Anglia’s (UEA) Climate Research Unit(CRU).  The UEA have publicly admitted that the leaked data ‘is’ theirs and the emails, data files, programs etc are genuine. The CRU’s results have gone to make up the IPCC’s findings concerning Global Warming Theory; in turn this theory has been  put forward as the foundation of the Copenhagen Treaty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
